title: Disconnected from a game but unable to reconnect
body:
So I was disconnected from a game, but after closing and reopening the game/client I haven't been able rejoin.

If I look at lolking it says the game is still going, even still counting up the game time. but I don't get a reconnect button anywhere. the client just opens like normal with the normal layout like there isn't a game to rejoin.

replies.body: I'm not certain about the info offered by third party sites, so it might be inaccurate.  Was this the game with Miss Fortune?  It looks like it may have resulted in a disappearing game, meaning it could have crashed.  In this case, it would act as if it never existed so your stats should be okay.  Let me know if that's the case.

I just had the same issue but I was in an ARAM game playing Darius. I cannot get back into the game. I believe it has crashed. But after I logged back on it was working fine. I still won't get LeaverBuster right?

For me the same just  happened is it possible to get banned for that??
I had some lags in many games today and the last match i just played i got a 500 ping and got disconnected so i restarted the launcher and when he opened up it was just the normal launcher like i never played this match

I would have reconnected because it looked good for us but i couldn't :/
Hope i get an answer to that 

NEOMANIE

Same happend to me, fourth time now. After Pick and Ban when the game starts I only get a blackscreen with an information that says i couldn't connect to the game. Even reconnecting doesn't work and after i close the Client I cant even log in anymore because of "incorrect password" even tough I have entered the right one. After some time the Client shows a message about some problems with the patch and that the launcher tries to reinstall an older one but nothing has happend since. Even reinstalling doesn't fix the problem for me. After a few hours the launcher works fine again for 2-3 game and then the same problem occurs over and over again. So I have no clue whats going on and i lost about 4 ranked games due to that. I guess I just stop playing for now until there is a fix available.

EDIT: I even got a Leaverbuster for a bug in the Client, feels bad man.

The same thing happened to me! I got kicked from the loading screen of my game (literally the last game of my promos), and I cannot get back into the client now for an "incorrect password". I clicked a link to reset my password, and I entered a new password, to which it responded "cannot use old password", but to log into League it tells me that password is incorrect....lol. I still have not been able to log back into the client...
it happen to me too. and i got a leaverbuster. this game is trash and full of bugs. But after that i get aLEAVERBUSTER. i mean WTF
